name: bend-subgraph
description: This package contains subgraph of the bend protocol

scripts.prepare:subgraph: mustache ./config/${NETWORK:-dev}.json ${BLOCKCHAIN:-ethereum}.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run subgraph:codegen
scripts.deploy-stack:local: npm run prepare:all && npm run subgraph:local
scripts.deploy:hosted:rinkeby: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=rinkeby env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=bend/bend-protocol-rinkeby env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=bend/bend-protocol env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:self-hosted:rinkeby: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=rinkeby npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=bend/bend-protocol-rinkeby npm run subgraph:deploy:self-hosted
scripts.deploy:self-hosted:mainnet: BLOCKCHAIN=ethereum NETWORK=mainnet npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=bend/bend-protocol npm run subgraph:deploy:self-hosted

author: BEND <dev@bendfinance.org>
